title: Princess Eugenie shares never-before-seen wedding party snaps
text:
The video will start in 8 Cancel

Get the biggest Royal Family stories by email Subscribe Thank you for subscribing We have more newsletters Show me See our privacy notice Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email

Princess Eugenie treated fans to a number of unseen video clips from her Royal Wedding to hubby Jack Brooksbank to celebrate their first wedding anniversary.

The Queen's grandaughter marked the special day over the weekend and took to social media to gush about "the greatest day of her life".

While we've seen most of the clips of the carriage ride and ceremony itself before, a few of the snippets from the private evening celebrations are new.

She also used the social media app's 'Stories' feature to share a new photo from the day, which also shows other royals including the Duchess of Cambridge and mother-of-the-bride Sarah Ferguson.

The video begins with an external shot of St George's Chapel, the same venue Prince Harry and Meghan Markle picked for their special day, covered in autumnal trees and flowers.

(Image: Getty Images)

There is then a shot of Eugenie's wedding dress on a mannequin and a sweet clips of Jack and his friends walking across Windsor Lodge's grounds on their way to the service.

Later, a clip from outside the evening reception venue shows two huge glitter balls hanging from trees.

There is a shot of guests, who have taken their jackets off, sitting around a table drinking champagne and orange juice with bread and butter also on the white table cloths.

We also see shots of Eugenie getting ready, and the princess laughs and smiles with loved one as the hairdresser finishes styling her locks and someone does up her dress.

(Image: princesseugenie/Instagram)

(Image: princesseugenie/Instagram)

There are romantic shots of the couple staring lovingly at each other during the service and sharing cute giggles together as husband and wife.

In her Instagram stories, Eugiene shared a photo of her and Jack pulling up at Windsor Lodge after their carriage ride to be greeted by several members of the Royal Family including her sister Beatrice.

Kate and Fergie are also there, and seem to be deep in conversation on the happy, happy day.

After the official and televised wedding ceremony was over guests joined the newlyweds for a champagne wedding lunch hosted by the Queen.

(Image: princesseugenie/Instagram)

About 850 guests, including Cara Delevingne, Robbie Williams, Jack Whitehall, Ricky Martin, Jamie Redknapp, tucked into finger food and wedding cake, washed down with Pol Roger champagne at the celebration.

Despite a social media ban, their celeb pals couldn't resist popping some snaps on Instagram.

The celebrations continued in the evening as the couple's parents threw a wild wedding after-party for 200 lucky guests.

(Image: Getty Images)

Robbie Williams reportedly jumped on stage to belt out some of his greatest hits after watching his six-year-old daughter Teddy perform bridesmaid duties.

Guests were also treated to a drinks menu which had been specially curated by Jack, in a marquee adorned with a stunning autumnal floral display, created by wedding florist Ron Van Helden.

The following day there was ANOTHER celebration as the couple hosted a "more relaxed" party with a "festival vibe" at Windsor Great Park.

A source told MailOnline: “There will be dodgems and funfair rides, coconut shies, lots of food stalls, loads of cocktails, bloody Marys for the hangovers and a festival vibe.”
description: Princess Eugenie took to social media on her first anniversary of marrying hubby Jack Brooksbank, saying "This was the greatest day of my life...forever and always"
